title-group.article-title: Lower Bounds for Nonoverlapping Domain Decomposition Preconditioners in Two Dimensions

abstract.p: Lower bounds for the condition numbers of the preconditioned systems are obtained for the Bramble-Pasciak-Schatz substructuring preconditioner and the Neumann-Neumann preconditioner in two dimensions. They show that the known upper bounds are sharp.
